description.value: As a main action, you swear a hunter’s oath against a creature within 10 squares who you have line of effect to. This oath lasts until the target dies or until you swear a hunter’s oath against a different creature. As long as the hunter’s oath lasts, you magically know the direction to the target if they are within 50 miles of you, and your damage-dealing abilities gain a +5 damage bonus against the target.
